message.body: decided against coming to class today?
Is it actually in the library?
oh, i didn't get it. and no, we're in the vis.arts
also apparently mary catherine had also suspected...

we did this exercise in class where we paired off and practiced interviewing each other. we ended up talking for a lot longer and, in talking about seeing her at dooley's ball, she's like, "i saw ben and paula, do they have a thing? i thought y'all had a thing!" i couldn't stop laughing.
but don't worry, i swore her to secrecy. :D
